permissions.MISSING_PERMISSION_SINGULAR: ‚ùå You do not have the '{permission}' permission to use this command.
permissions.MISSING_PERMISSION_PLURAL: ‚ùå You are missing the '{permissions}' permissions to use this command.

help_command.DESCRIPTION: Displays a list of all commands or information about a specific command.
help_command.COMMAND_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: The command you want to know more about.
help_command.TITLE: Help for {commandName}
help_command.ALL_COMMANDS_DESCRIPTION: Use `/help <command>` for more information about a command.
help_command.GENERAL_OVERVIEW_DESCRIPTION: Welcome to the bot help! Select a category from the dropdown menu to see available commands.
help_command.CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION: Here are the commands in the '{category}' category:
help_command.NO_COMMANDS_IN_CATEGORY: No commands found in this category.
help_command.FOOTER_SELECT_HINT: Select a category from the dropdown menu.
help_command.admin_category_description: Commands for server management and configuration.
help_command.economy_category_description: Commands for the bot's economy system.
help_command.moderation_category_description: Commands for moderating members and messages.
help_command.wirtschaftssystem_category_description: Commands for the bot's economy system.

level_command.DESCRIPTION: Displays your current level and XP.
level_command.USER_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: The user whose level to display (optional).
level_command.YOUR_LEVEL_DESCRIPTION: You are Level **{level}** with **{xp}** XP. Required for next level: **{requiredXp}** XP.
level_command.USER_LEVEL_DESCRIPTION: **{userTag}** is Level **{level}** with **{xp}** XP. Required for next level: **{requiredXp}** XP.
level_command.NOT_LEVELED_YET: This user has no level data yet.

autotimeout_command.DESCRIPTION: Manages automatic timeouts for spam violations.
autotimeout_command.SET_DURATION_SUBCOMMAND_DESCRIPTION: Sets the duration for automatic timeouts (e.g., "10m", "1h").
autotimeout_command.SET_VIOLATIONS_SUBCOMMAND_DESCRIPTION: Sets the number of spam violations before an automatic timeout occurs.
autotimeout_command.SET_LOG_CHANNEL_SUBCOMMAND_DESCRIPTION: Sets the log channel for automatic timeout actions.
autotimeout_command.LOG_CHANNEL_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: The text channel to send logs to (optional, leave empty to remove).
autotimeout_command.STATUS_SUBCOMMAND_DESCRIPTION: Displays the current automatic timeout settings.
autotimeout_command.INVALID_DURATION: Invalid duration. Please use formats like "10m", "1h", "1d" (maximum {maxDuration}).
autotimeout_command.DURATION_SET_SUCCESS: ‚úÖ Duration for automatic timeouts successfully set to {duration}.
autotimeout_command.VIOLATIONS_SET_SUCCESS: ‚úÖ Number of violations for automatic timeouts successfully set to {count}.
autotimeout_command.LOG_CHANNEL_SET_SUCCESS: ‚úÖ Log channel for automatic timeouts successfully set to {channelMention}.
autotimeout_command.LOG_CHANNEL_REMOVED_SUCCESS: ‚úÖ Log channel for automatic timeouts successfully removed.

calendar_command.TIME_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: The time of the event (HH:MM, optional).
calendar_command.EVENT_ID_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: The ID of the event to remove.
calendar_command.ADD_SUCCESS: ‚úÖ Event '{eventName}' on {date} at {time} successfully added. ID: `{eventId}`

clear_command.DESCRIPTION: Deletes a specified number of messages in a channel.
clear_command.AMOUNT_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: The number of messages to delete (1-100).
clear_command.INVALID_AMOUNT: ‚ùå Please provide a number between 1 and 100.
clear_command.NO_PERMISSION: ‚ùå I do not have permission to manage messages.

giveaway_command.END_DESCRIPTION_NO_WINNERS: Unfortunately, there were not enough participants for the giveaway.
giveaway_command.INVALID_DURATION: ‚ùå Invalid duration. Please use formats like 10m, 1h, 1d.
giveaway_command.INVALID_WINNERS: ‚ùå Invalid winner count. Please provide a number greater than 0.

kick_command.DESCRIPTION: Kicks a user from the server.
kick_command.NO_PERMISSION_BOT: ‚ùå I do not have permission to kick members.
kick_command.NO_PERMISSION_USER: ‚ùå You do not have permission to kick members.
kick_command.CANNOT_KICK_HIGHER: ‚ùå I cannot kick this user because their role is higher than or equal to mine.
kick_command.USER_NOT_ON_SERVER: ‚ùå This user is not on this server.

poll_command.OPTIONS_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: The options for the poll, separated by commas (min. 2, max. 10).
poll_command.INVALID_OPTIONS: ‚ùå Please provide at least 2 and a maximum of 10 options, separated by commas.

rejoin_rollen_command.DESCRIPTION: Manages roles that are automatically assigned on rejoin.
rejoin_rollen_command.ADD_SUBCOMMAND_DESCRIPTION: Adds a role to the rejoin list.
rejoin_rollen_command.REMOVE_SUBCOMMAND_DESCRIPTION: Removes a role from the rejoin list.

rejoin_rollen_command.REMOVE_SUCCESS: ‚úÖ Role {roleName} was removed from the rejoin list.
rejoin_rollen_command.ALREADY_ON_LIST: ‚ö†Ô∏è Role {roleName} is already on the rejoin list.
rejoin_rollen_command.NOT_ON_LIST: ‚ùå Role {roleName} is not on the rejoin list.
rejoin_rollen_command.LIST_DESCRIPTION: These roles are automatically assigned to members on rejoin:

say_command.DESCRIPTION: Makes the bot send a message in a specific channel.
say_command.CHANNEL_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: The channel to send the message to.
say_command.MESSAGE_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: The message the bot should send.
say_command.NO_PERMISSION: ‚ùå I do not have permission to send messages in this channel.

schedule_command.DESCRIPTION: Schedules a message to be sent at a specific time.
schedule_command.TIME_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: The time at which the message should be sent (e.g., "in 1h", "tomorrow at 10:00").
schedule_command.CHANNEL_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: The channel to send the message to (optional, defaults to current channel).
schedule_command.INVALID_TIME: ‚ùå Invalid time. Please use formats like "in 10 minutes" or "tomorrow at 2 PM".

spam_command.ENABLE_SUBCOMMAND_DESCRIPTION: Enables spam detection for this server.
spam_command.DISABLE_SUBCOMMAND_DESCRIPTION: Disables spam detection for this server.
spam_command.SET_CHARACTER_SPAM_THRESHOLD_SUBCOMMAND_: Sets the threshold for excessive repeating characters (0.0-1.0).
spam_command.CHARACTER_SPAM_THRESHOLD_SET_SUCCESS: ‚úÖ Character spam threshold successfully set to {threshold}%.
spam_command.SET_MAX_EMOTES_SUBCOMMAND_DESCRIPTION: Sets the maximum number of emotes per message (0 for unlimited).
spam_command.MAX_EMOTES_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: Maximum number of emotes (e.g., 5). Set to 0 for unlimited.
spam_command.MAX_EMOTES_SET_SUCCESS: ‚úÖ Maximum emotes per message successfully set to {count}.
spam_command.SET_MAX_STICKERS_SUBCOMMAND_DESCRIPTION: Sets the maximum number of stickers per message (0 for unlimited).
spam_command.MAX_STICKERS_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: Maximum number of stickers (e.g., 1). Set to 0 for unlimited.
spam_command.MAX_STICKERS_SET_SUCCESS: ‚úÖ Maximum stickers per message successfully set to {count}.
spam_command.LINK_GROUP_DESCRIPTION: Manages blocked links for spam detection.
spam_command.LINK_ADD_SUBCOMMAND_DESCRIPTION: Adds a link or domain to the blocklist.
spam_command.LINK_REMOVE_SUBCOMMAND_DESCRIPTION: Removes a link or domain from the blocklist.
spam_command.LINK_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: The full link or domain (e.g., "malicious.com" or "phishing.link/scam").
spam_command.LINK_OPTION_DESCRIPTION_REMOVE: The link or domain to remove.
spam_command.link_added_success: ‚úÖ Link/Domain `{link}` was added to the blocklist.
spam_command.link_already_added: ‚ö†Ô∏è Link/Domain `{link}` is already on the blocklist.
spam_command.link_removed_success: ‚úÖ Link/Domain `{link}` was removed from the blocklist.
spam_command.link_not_found: ‚ùå Link/Domain `{link}` was not found on the blocklist.
spam_command.no_links_added: No links currently added to the blocklist.
spam_command.RAID_SET_THRESHOLDS_SUBCOMMAND_DESCRIPTI: Sets the thresholds for raid detection.
spam_command.RAID_MESSAGE_COUNT_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: Number of similar messages that trigger detection.
spam_command.RAID_USER_COUNT_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: Number of unique users sending similar messages.
spam_command.RAID_STATUS_SUBCOMMAND_DESCRIPTION: Displays the current raid protection settings.
spam_command.RAID_INVALID_TIME_PERIOD: Invalid time period. Please use formats like "15s", "1m", "5m" (maximum 1 hour).
spam_command.RAID_THRESHOLDS_SET_SUCCESS: ‚úÖ Raid thresholds successfully set: {messageCount} messages in {timePeriod} from {userCount} users.

spam_detection.LINK_DELETED_DESCRIPTION: A message from **{userTag}** in {channelMention} was deleted because it contained a blocked link: `{link}`.
spam_detection.LINK_DELETED_USER_NOTIFICATION: Your message was deleted because it contained a blocked link (`{link}`). Please do not post such links.
spam_detection.RAID_DETECTED_DESCRIPTION:
A potential raid has been detected!

**Details:**
- {messageCount} similar messages
- from {userCount} unique users
- within {timePeriod}
spam_detection.CHARACTER_SPAM_DELETED_DESCRIPTION: A message from **{userTag}** in {channelMention} was deleted because it contained excessive repeating characters.
spam_detection.CHARACTER_SPAM_USER_NOTIFICATION: Your message was deleted because it contained too many repeating characters. Please avoid character spam.
spam_detection.EMOTE_SPAM_DELETED_DESCRIPTION: A message from **{userTag}** in {channelMention} was deleted because it contained too many emotes.
spam_detection.EMOTE_SPAM_USER_NOTIFICATION: Your message was deleted because it contained too many emotes. Please avoid emote spam.
spam_detection.STICKER_SPAM_DELETED_DESCRIPTION: A message from **{userTag}** in {channelMention} was deleted because it contained too many stickers.
spam_detection.STICKER_SPAM_USER_NOTIFICATION: Your message was deleted because it contained too many stickers. Please avoid sticker spam.

timeout_command.DURATION_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: The duration of the timeout (e.g., 10m, 1h, 1d). Max. 28 days.

untimeout_command.USER_NOT_IN_TIMEOUT: ‚ùå This user is not in timeout.

autotimeout.TIMEOUT_USER_DM: You were timed out on **{guildName}** for **{duration}**. Reason: {reason}
autotimeout.TIMEOUT_FAILED_BOT_PERMS: Could not time out **{userTag}**. I am missing permissions (`Moderate Members`).

autotimeout.TIMEOUT_FAILED_IS_BOT: Could not time out **{userTag}**. The user is another bot.
